title: Terrorist attack averted in Bangalore Today.
selftext:
https://m.timesofindia.com/city/bengaluru/major-terror-plot-averted-in-bengaluru-5-suspects-arrested/articleshow/101915727.cms?from=mdr

Thanks to CBI and others for saving the city by its own people.
comments:
CBI?! You mean local police's CCB.

Only one group benefits politically from such attacks or allegations of planned attacks. Interesting timing.
